content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case involving two parties ms concetta serino and eq gerit spa the court approved a division project for the division of properties including a farm building agricultural land and other structures the court ordered the drawing of lots to allocate the properties between the parties and addressed the payment of debts and expenses related to the properties after considering the evidence presented the court made a final judgment which the parties agreed to the court ordered the costs of the proceedings to be shared between the parties and noted that the judgment can be transcribed and the properties divided accordingly additionally the court partially accepted ms serinos payment request and ordered eq gerit spa to pay her a sum of eur 902416 plus interest the court also declared the succession of two individuals and determined that their legitimate heirs are the children of bu ra and mi with each receiving a 12 share of the hereditary estate consisting of a plot of land with a farm building and rural buildings the court approved a division project for the estate which includes two lots the court ordered the dissolution of the existing community and the drawing of lots for the portions of the estate the court rejected any other claims or counterclaims made by the defendant and ordered them to fully compensate the costs of the case finally the court ordered the transcription of the judgment by the registrar and the drawing of lots by the parties involved
